main.name: Ruth C. Morata Gil
main.biofirst: My name is Ruth C. and I am a Junior Full Stack Developer. I was born in Barcelona in 1985 and I dwelt both in Oxford (UK) and in Austria. I enjoy contributing, structuring, creating and suggesting improvements. I am currently searching for job opportunities to keep growing and learning. Looking forward to an exciting project to involve myself in!
main.biosecond: Web development/design and Movement/body arts are the two fields my days revolve around and that I have my heart stolen by. I also try my best to be an NVC (Non-Violent Communication) practitioner.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to give me a shout by email or by using the form below.
main.contactwarningmessage: Warning: Contact form not yet configured, please contact me via normal email for now

education.degree: Master's degree in Full Stack Development
education.description: Technologies learned: ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, Laravel (PHP), Docker, Git/Github, SQL. Usage of Agile Methodology
Learnt how to work with 3D animation

education.degree: Master’s Project in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description: Second year. I completed my 2-year Master's degree with this project titled 'Conformational Flexibility and Ligand Binding of the Outer Membrane Enzyme PagP'. I joined as a Visiting Researcher at the Structural Bioinformatics and Computational Biochemistry Unit, placed in the Biochemistry Department of the University of Oxford (UK). Keywords: Membrane Proteins, Molecular Dynamics Simulations, GROMACS, Coarse Grain, Atomistic, Protein-Ligand Docking

education.degree: Master’s degree in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description: First year of my Master's degree. Keywords: Molecular Dynamics Simulations, Computer-Assisted Drug Discovery, Perl/Python/R Programming, Computational Systems Biology, Genomic Bioinformatics, Project Management
First University studies. Keywords: Quantum Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Data Analysis, FORTRAN, Organic and Inorganic Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry

work.company: BC Tours / Transcoma / DW (Bags&Go) / Intercruises / Exploramás / Spinergy / Tumlare / Tais / Citytravel / The Tour Guy / My Friendly Guide

work.description: Cruise check-in agent at Port Barcelona. Transfers, hospitalities, tours. Team building events for corporations. Host services for AMA Waterways and Viking Cruises. Technical administrator: SAP, MWC, BIZ, ITMA, Smart City, IBTM, Fòrum Gastronòmic. Incentives: Chairman’s Council EMEA

work.title: English teacher (Freelance)
work.description: Private English teacher for kids, teenagers and adults. Preparation for official examinations

work.title: Logistics agent
work.description: In charge of the administration and shipping of goods at the Logistic Dept. for national and international clients. Apprentice at the I+D Dept
